# btp_subaccount_role_collection_role (Data Source)

Gets details about a specific role assigned to a subaccount role collection.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "btp_subaccount_role_collection_role" "Subaccount_Viewer" {
  subaccount_id = "1ecb7280-c7d4-4db6-b7da-7af3cdb13505"
  name          = "my_collection"
  role_name     = "Subaccount Viewer"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the role collection.
- `role_name` (String) The name of the role.
- `subaccount_id` (String) The ID of the subaccount.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) The description of the referenced role.
- `role_template_app_id` (String) The name of the referenced template app id.
- `role_template_name` (String) The name of the referenced role template.
